record.field: Trying to fail different kind of payments at the same time.
Trying to fail payments from different journals at the same time.
Payments with same merged_id must be failed at the same time.
The transition to the approved state is not allowed on the payment with the merged id %(merged_id)s.

Payment dates will automatically be updated to %(date)s for consistency:
%(dates)s
The reason code on journal %(journal)s is not found.
The payment group %(number)s should not be acknowledged: %(date)s < %(payment_date)s.
The payment group %(number)s is not deletable.
The payment group %(number)s has payment(s) which does not allow the deletion.
Trying to fail different payment methods at the same time.
Trying to fail different payment kinds at the same time.
Selected payments must have the same payment method.
Selected payments status must be succeeded or processing.
Selected lines are incompatible. Some are payable lines some are receivable.
Selected lines are incompatible with selected kind.
The payment date for all payments will be updated to %(date)s.
The allowed payment journals for the selected lines are different and do not allow them to be processed at the same time.
